title: Textile, 1918
medium:
Medium: wool, cotton
Technique: woven imitation of wool needlepoint
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (A - selvage to selvage): 14 x 12.2 cm (5 1/2 x 4 13/16 in.)
Warp x Weft (B - selvage to selvage): 6 x 6 cm (2 3/8 x 2 3/8 in.)
description:
A) Length of upholstery fabric with an exotic floral vine muted red, blue, green and ochre on black background. The pattern is achieved by brick repeat of the rectangular pattern.
B) Same pattern with deep purple, blue-green, dark green, yellow and ochre floral vines and tan backgrond.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1918.Medium: wool, cotton
Technique: woven imitation of wool needlepoint. 1971-56-1-a,b.
